CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 14, 1959, pg. 21, reads: "Time Out - Gov. David L. Lawrence, left, seems to be dominating the conversation between some of the standout guests at the annual Dapper Dan dinner Sunday night at the Hotel Penn Sheraton. Others in picture are Jim Brown, Cleveland Browns' fullback; Roberto Clemente, Pittsburgh Pirates' outfielder and now a member of the U. S. Marines, and Mayor Thomas Gallagher. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pennsylvania Governor David L. Lawrence, Cleveland Browns football player Jim Brown, Pittsburgh Pirates baseball player Roberto Clemente, and Pittsburgh Mayor Thomas Gallagher, standing in Penn Sheraton Hotel
